title: Buying RP with gift cards?
body: I'm trying to buy RP using a subway gift card but when I click on the amount I want, it doesn't load at all on the legacy client. I also tried this on the new client and it gives me an error. Is openbucks just down or can I just not use gift cards anymore to buy RP?

replies.body: Open-bucks "the client riot uses for gift cards" is under going maintenance and will be back up shortly we are sorry for the inconvenience.
I'm having the same problem too. Please help
Has this issue been resolved by now, or are you still having issues with this?
